Package com.project.couponProject3.controllers

Class CompanyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.couponProject3.controllers.ClientController
      • com.project.couponProject3.controllers.CompanyController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("company")
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class CompanyController
extends ClientController
    Class of company controller for REST commands

      • addCoupon

        @PostMapping("add/coupon")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addCoupon​(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization")
                                                            java.lang.String token,
                                                            @RequestBody
                                                            Coupon coupon)
                                                     throws CouponException,
                                                            io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException
        Method of REST command, using post mapping for adding new coupon to the system. Endpoint is: add/coupon Receives and returns the data in JSON data structure.
        Parameters:
        token - for authorization
        coupon - the coupon instance to add
        Returns:
        new token and an indication message of coupon created
        Throws:
        CouponException - if data is incorrect
        io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException - if token is invalid
